function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of capacity to de-densify small premises leading to limited social distancing measures.","Impact":"Risks of increased transmission of contagious diseases due to crowded spaces.","Mitigation":"Restricting the number of customers, implementing delivery services, or seeking strategic partnerships.","Technologies":"Web design for online delivery platforms.","People":"Small service organizations, customers.","Owner":"Management, service operators."},{"Description":"Financial investments required for strategic partnerships and web design for delivery services.","Impact":"Increased economic strain on small service organizations, leading to potential closure.","Mitigation":"Financial support, government grants, or cost-sharing initiatives with larger organizations.","Technologies":"Online platforms, digital marketing tools.","People":"Small service organizations, management, customers.","Owner":"Small service organizations, government, larger organizations."},{"Description":"Increased inequality and lack of diversity among service organizations due to COVID-19 constraints.","Impact":"Exacerbation of existing social inequalities, potential closures of small businesses.","Mitigation":"Promoting diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives, support for small businesses, advocacy for fair economic policies.","Technologies":"Diversity and inclusion training, economic policy platforms.","People":"Service organization owners, management, employees, customers.","Owner":"Government, advocacy groups, service organizations."}]}
